channel.title: Light Pkz || Spawn PVP || Custom Items || 25+ Pking Spots || Unique Forums || NE
channel.description:
[B][CENTER] [IMG]http://cdn.ihostinghq.com/xmirzob/files/theme_builder_files/themebuilder_rw7m_3.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://www.playlightpkz.tk/"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/m2Rep6I.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/38535602/lightpkz.jar"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xx1rIck.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://"http://www.lightpkz.tk/"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/o0LJ0hG.png[/img][/URL]
[SIZE=7]WWW.LIGHTPKZ.TK[/SIZE]
[URL=http://"http://www.lightpkz.tk/"][IMG]http://s12.postimg.org/i4bw3fdik/layout.jpg[/img][/URL]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/3gWHt.jpg[/img]
[SIZE=7]Features:[/SIZE]
Simple Starter - Read "book" to spawn pre made kits. KillStreak - Kill more, gain more Pk Tickets Good Combat System (Working on it) Balanced Weapons and Armour Good Switching (Working on it) Pk Tickets Economy (Recieve 500 Pk Tickets Per kill) Kill/Death Ratio - Keep track of your progress (Easy add) Donator Zone/Shop Turmoil All items can be used by Players! (No Donator only) 25+ PVP Spots ::master :ure ::setlevel ::item ::getid commands (and more) Custom items Custom Interfaces Vote System Donation System (In Progress) Much more, I will update as I go along.
[SIZE=7]MEDIA:[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qRZiLwD.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Lq57NFh.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BqRFAHq.png[/img]
------------------------------------------------------------
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zmUvoyo.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6tjx6WP.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PahY9je.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uJ8CXeU.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UA6lZBo.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bSN8c8m.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/53cu9Xa.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cPduc5N.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FEmT6Gn.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gmaP4io.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9blA2Eb.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4gfr9s0.png[/img]
[SIZE=7]Credits:[/SIZE]
Assassin - Owner of Esstoren [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/sanity/"]Sanity[/URL] - PI Base [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/officialkingpkz/"]Officialkingpkz[/URL] - Help
[/CENTER]

item.description:
@MasterPkz317 wrote:

[B][CENTER]

[SIZE=7]WWW.LIGHTPKZ.TK[/SIZE]

[SIZE=7]Features:[/SIZE]

Simple Starter - Read “book” to spawn pre made kits.
KillStreak - Kill more, gain more Pk Tickets
Good Combat System (Working on it)
Balanced Weapons and Armour
Good Switching (Working on it)
Pk Tickets Economy (Recieve 500 Pk Tickets Per kill)
Kill/Death Ratio - Keep track of your progress (Easy add)
Donator Zone/Shop
Turmoil
All items can be used by Players! (No Donator only)
25+ PVP Spots
::master :ure ::setlevel ::item ::getid commands (and more)
Custom items
Custom Interfaces
Vote System
Donation System (In Progress)
Much more, I will update as I go along.

[SIZE=7]MEDIA:[/SIZE]
